data.eml:eml: Pairs in copulation of the highly dimorphic genus Pristocera Klug (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae) from Madagascar solve taxonomic problems of male-female associations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azevedo, Celso O., Alencar, Isabel D. C. C., Colombo, Wesley D. (2018): Pairs in copulation of the highly dimorphic genus Pristocera Klug (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae) from Madagascar solve taxonomic problems of male-female associations. Zootaxa 4433 (1): 1-49, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4433.1.1
